description: Alterations during course of construction to permission dated 31 Jan 2003 (RN: 00/01653) & listed building consent dated 2 June 1999 (97A488) for roof and rear extensions and refurbishment of George St properties; use of basement and ground floors for Class A1,  A2 and A4 purposes and conversion of upper floors to flats; refurbishment and rear extensions to Gloucester Pl properties, use of basement, ground and part first floors as offices (Class B1) and use of part 1st-4th floors as flats; redevelopment of 13-16 Portman Cl as 4 town houses and excavation to provide 4 levels of basement parking namely: use of the ground floor at 81 George Street as a res' access (Class C3); dual use of 1st-4th floors at 20/22 Gloucester Pl as 4 flats or offices (Class B1), modification to car parking arrangements to provide parking for 44 cars, internal and external alterations to create 35 or 39 flats and the installation of new plant and screening to the roof of 89 George Street.
